snippet: Nationally, the share of voters who could decide the election is likely between just 3 percent and 5 percent, polling experts say.
abstract: Polling experts say the share of swing voter up for grabs in the presidential election is likely between just 3 and 5 percent.
lead_paragraph: Nationally, the share of voters who could decide the election is likely between just 3 percent and 5 percent, polling experts say.

headline.main: Few Voters Are Truly Up for Grabs, Research Suggests
headline.print_headline: Few Voters Are Truly Up for Grabs, Research Shows
